name: Bao Finance
introduce: Bao Finance is a a cross-chain DeFi Ecosystem that adds features to existing DeFi systems. Bao Finance is building innovative products: synthetics that utilize LP tokens as collateral; lending pools which will utilize LP tokens as collateral; auto-balancer system that will manage a users synthetics, futures and LP positions; options, perpetual futures, margin trading and limit orders utilizing LP tokens as collateral.
